id.description: Unique identifier for the line item

name.description: Human-readable name for the line item

start_date.description: Line item start date in YYYY-MM-DD format

end_date.description: Line item end date in YYYY-MM-DD format

channel.description: Media channel for the line item (e.g., Digital, TV, Radio, Print)

channel_custom.description: Custom channel specification when standard channel options don't apply

vehicle.description: Media vehicle or platform (e.g., Facebook, Google, CNN, Spotify)

vehicle_custom.description: Custom vehicle specification when standard vehicle options don't apply

partner.description: Media partner or vendor handling the placement

partner_custom.description: Custom partner specification when standard partner options don't apply

media_product.description: Specific media product or ad unit being purchased

media_product_custom.description: Custom media product specification when standard options don't apply

location_type.description: Geographic scope type for the line item targeting

location_name.description: Name of the geographic location being targeted

target_audience.description: Description of the target audience for this line item

adformat.description: Creative format or ad type (e.g., Banner, Video, Native)

adformat_custom.description: Custom ad format specification when standard formats don't apply

kpi.description: Primary key performance indicator for the line item

kpi_custom.description: Custom KPI specification when standard KPIs don't apply

dayparts.description: Time periods when the ad should run (e.g., Primetime, Morning, All Day)
